product_name: GoPro HERO12 Creator Edition 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera

description.title: GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera
description.details: The GoPro HERO12 Creator Edition 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera is a high-performance action camera that can capture stunning photographs and movies in various situations. It features a 27-megapixel CMOS sensor, allowing for 5.3K video at 60 frames per second or 4K video at 120 frames per second. It also supports raw still picture capture, providing additional editing options. The GoPro HERO12 Creator Edition 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera has a fixed touchscreen LCD for setting and adjusting settings and digital image stabilization for smooth footage. It is waterproof up to 33 feet (10.1 meters) and has a microSD card slot for up to 512 GB of data. It lacks a built-in microphone but can be connected to an external microphone using an adaptor. The camera is compatible with the GoPro Quik app for iOS, which allows editing and sharing footage. GoPro HERO12 Creator Edition 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera also supports IP streaming at 1080p quality using the H.265 codec. The rechargeable battery pack can record continuously for up to 2 hours.

description.title: GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition 27MP 5.3K Waterproof Touch Screen Action Camera
description.details: The GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition Action Camera serves as a versatile all-in-one device for capturing content, significantly simplifying vlogging, filmmaking, and live streaming tasks. This comprehensive system comes equipped with professional-grade 5.3K video capabilities, the renowned HyperSmooth 5.0 video stabilization, improved audio quality, potent LED lighting, and an impressive 4 hours of 4K recording time per charge.

description.title: Hollywood in your hand.
description.details: The revolutionary GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition Action Camera offers unparalleled image quality. Its highly adaptable hand grip ensures all-day usage with one-handed control. With numerous mounting choices, it provides convenience and flexibility. Additionally, it boasts exceptional lighting, and audio capabilities, and offers unlimited cloud backup. This all-encompassing setup equips you with everything necessary to craft your masterpiece.

description.title: One shot. Share anywhere.
description.details: A larger new image sensor gives you an extra-large canvas to play with. The expansive field of view lets you zoom, crop or change digital lenses to nail any look when editing.

description.title: Get pro-level video with cinematic 5K.
description.details: The GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition Action Camera delivers ultra-crisp 5.3K video resolution, adding a highly professional touch to all your recordings. It also boasts an impressive 8x slo-mo capability at a stunning 2.7K resolution and allows you to extract 24.7MP frame grabs from your videos.

description.title: Emmy Award-Winning Video Stabilization
description.details: HyperSmooth 5.0 raises the bar for in-camera video stabilization, giving you impossibly smooth footage no matter how rough it gets. No gimbal or special software required for professional results.

description.title: AutoBoost
description.details: The GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition 27MP 5.3K Action Camera With HyperSmooth 5.0, HERO11 Black automatically determines the level of video stabilization you need based on your speed and movement for the smoothest, widest shots possible.

description.title: Built-in Horizon Lock
description.details: The GoPro HERO11 Black Creator Edition 27MP 5.3K Action Camera ensures your horizon remains level, even if the camera tilts during recording. With the integrated Horizon Lock in HyperSmooth 5.0, maintaining a steady and consistent horizon while your camera rotates a full 360° is now effortlessly achievable.

features.View: Up to 8x Zoom, 93° Angle of View

description.title: DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Axis Gimbal Stabilizer Action Camera
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera adds a 1/1.7" 64MP CMOS sensor, up to 8x zoom, a 93Â° angle of view, and four directional stereo microphones with DJI Matrix Stereo audio zoom to its predecessor, employing its lightweight, ultra-compact 3-axis gimbal stabilizer and 4K camera combo. New software additions include an upgraded ActiveTrack 3.0, built-in glamour effects, an AI editor, Hybrid AF 2.0, and motion-lapse, all without the need for a smartphone app. It includes everything you'll need for a high-resolution mobile production to make family films, add footage to photo sessions or vlog your latest streaming masterpieces with smooth motion video.

description.title: Pocket-Sized and Creator Combo
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera is a pocket-sized and incredibly portable camera that allows you to film unforgettable events on your own. It can steady movement, capture excellent photographs, and record smooth movies. A wide-angle lens, a "Do-it-All" handle, a USB Type-A to Type-C splitter, a wireless microphone transmitter, and a mini tripod are all included in the Creator Combo.

description.title: High-Definition Panorama and ActiveTrack 3.0
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera Get a 180Â° panorama of the entire mountain range or a 3x3 panoramic of everyone in a group selfie. With ActiveTrack 3.0, Pocket 2 keeps you and your buddies in the shot no matter how you move.

description.title: Story Mode and Time-Lapse
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera Story mode employs video and audio templates to create thrilling mini-movies in a matter of seconds. Time-lapse photography allows you to compress hours into seconds. Motion-lapse incorporates smooth camera movement. Hyper-lapse photography allows you to journey through time.

description.title: AI Editor and Motorized Stabilization
description.details: Not interested in editing? AI Editor blends your video with transitions and music to produce shareable content. Glamour effects, an AI editor, and narrative mode software are all included.

description.title: Hollywood-Quality Smoothness and Image Quality
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera 3-axis motorized gimbal is what permits this little camera to provide large-screen effects. The Pocket 2 has a 1/1.7" sensor, can take up to 64MP images, can shoot video at up to 4K60, and has Hybrid AF 2.0.

description.title: HDR Video and 8x Zoom
description.details: The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera is a 3-in-1 action camera. A good life is full of color, so let it all shine. DJI Pocket 2 uses HDR video to split exposure settings by location and overlay the image so that the film bursts with life-like realism. Looking for attention to detail? The stabilized camera captures excellent 8x zoom stills while capturing 64MP images, up to 4x zoom on 1080p video, and up to 2x zoom on 4K video. It has no warranty.

product_name: GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera

Key Features.Memory: Single Slot: microSD/microSDHC (UHS-I) [512 Maximum / U3/V30 or Faster Recommended]

description.title: GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera
description.details: The GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera is a high-performance action camera that allows you to shoot spectacular photographs and movies in any situation. It includes a 27-megapixel CMOS sensor and can capture 5.3K video at 60 frames per second or 4K video at 120 frames per second. It also supports raw still picture capture, giving you additional editing options. It sports a fixed touchscreen LCD where you can adjust the camera settings and examine your images. It has digital image stabilization, which decreases camera shake and produces smooth footage. It is waterproof without a housing up to 33 feet (10.1 meters), so you may carry it underwater or in wet situations. The GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera contains a microSD card slot that can hold up to 512 GB of data (UHS-I U3/V30 or faster is suggested). It lacks a built-in microphone; however, an external microphone can be used connected to an adaptor (available separately). It is compatible with the GoPro Quik app for iOS, which allows you to simply edit and share your footage. The software also supports IP streaming at 1080p quality using the H.265 codec. The GoPro HERO12 27MP Waterproof Touch Screen 5.3K Action Camera features a rechargeable battery pack with a capacity of 1720 mAh that can record continuously for up to 2 hours (depending on the settings). Whether you're skiing, surfing, bicycling, or diving, the camera is an excellent companion.
